2014210.name: Every Hue of You
2014210.description:
Every Hue of You sees Twyla struggle to take over her late mother's famed jewellery shop. One fortunate night, Twyla discovers she is a conduit - allowing her to take on the emotional energy of others, and transfer it.

Suddenly, Twyla is enchanting jewellery with her customers' emotions, helping them create the perfect sentimental gifts for their loved ones! Delve into deep conversation with memorable characters, and embrace them in their every hue to coax out their true feelings.

A UNIQUE WORLD

In the world of Every Hue of You, emotions have possessed a special energy for as long as we remember - Paeos. If we don't keep our Paeos under control, anything could happen. An overwhelming joy could cause a field of flowers to bloom! ...But an intense anger could burn down forests.

So, in Twyla's city of Zenoa, people regulate their emotions so cautiously that emotional expression has become stigmatised. And those who struggle to control their feelings are shamed by the community.

A COMING-OF-AGE STORY

Twyla finds herself at the wrong end of society, unable to keep her emotions in line after her mother's passing has left her lost, lonely and confused. Until suddenly, a mysterious hooded man barges into her store, with a stern look in his eyes. But even he knows nothing of how her jewellery will flip their lives upside down.

Play as Twyla in this fantastical coming-of-age adventure as she revitalises her store and herself, working to decipher the emotional plight of her people, one customer at a time.


    Features

  • A diverse range of thoughtfully hand-crafted characters, each with their own unique hue
  • A story arc dedicated to Twyla's journey through her depression, grief and stress
  • Over 100 beautifully hand-drawn backgrounds, CGs and environments
  • Short but sweet mIni-games where you craft and enchant jewellery
  • A jazzy soundtrack filled with lovely tunes that vary depending on the customer and their mood
  • A thorough exploration of human experiences just like yours, featuring deeply personal and thought-provoking philosophical and psychological ideas
  • Plenty of impactful choices that allow you to help Twyla decide how best to approach her customers
  • A cohesive story from start to finish, with around 5-8 hours of play

highlighted.name: Make your first piece of jewellery.
